about_the_game:
Step into the role of a deity in this fast-paced 3D real-time strategy and god simulation game. Command a civilization of ghouls in a swampy fantasy world, utilizing physics-based combat to lead your tribe to victory.

Key Features:

  • Lead a Ghoul Civilization

    • Command a variety of ghouls, each with distinct perks.

    • Manage resources like food and mana to expand your tribe.

    • Equip your ghouls with melee or ranged weapons, engaging in dynamic physics-based combat with throwable weapons.

  • Customize and Strategize

    • Influence your ghouls' behavior by distributing skill points across various stats.

    • Tailor your strategy by enhancing specific attributes to suit your playstyle.

    • Unlock new ghoul types and spells as you progress through the game.

  • Conquer and Expand

    • Use powerful spells to support your tribe or hinder your enemies.

    • Construct buildings to produce weapons, generate mana, and expand your control.

    • Face off against rival ghoul tribes and formidable bosses.

  • Level Editor

    • Create your own levels with a powerful, tool-assisted editor.

    • Design levels effortlessly by setting key details—the rest is automatically generated.

Gameplay Overview:

As a deity, your mission is to grow and lead your ghoul civilization while managing essential resources like food and mana. Your ghouls have their own behaviors but can be guided to gather resources, build structures, and engage enemies. Food allows them to reproduce and pray, generating mana for casting powerful spells.

Customize your tribe through a dynamic skill system that lets you enhance specific attributes of your ghouls, influencing their abilities and tactics. Whether you prefer aggressive combat, resource efficiency, or strategic spellcasting, you can tailor your approach to each scenario.

Engage in thrilling physics-based combat where every thrown weapon and environmental interaction can change the course of battle. Equip your ghouls with melee weapons or staffs for ranged attacks to your advantage.

Use a variety of spells to bolster your ghouls or disrupt your foes, altering the battlefield and influencing the outcome of engagements. Construct buildings to expand your territory, produce weapons, and generate additional mana.

Immerse yourself in a vibrant world where strategy and quick thinking are key. Lead your tribe to ultimate supremacy in this unique blend of real-time strategy and god simulation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 5900X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
